snippet: The authorities accused the suspects of belonging to a kidnapping and murder gang in the Pacific coast resort of Acapulco.
abstract: Mexican authorities say they have arrested 13 federal police officers who allegedly belonged to violent gang in Pacific coast resort of Acapulco.
lead_paragraph: The authorities accused the suspects of belonging to a kidnapping and murder gang in the Pacific coast resort of Acapulco.

headline.main: Mexico: 13 Federal Officers Are Arrested on Murder and Kidnapping Charges
headline.print_headline: Mexico: 13 Federal Officers Are Arrested On Murder and Kidnapping Charges
